r.s: Extension for IBM DB2 Universal Database, IBM Cloudscape, and Apache Derby
r.d: This extension supports IBM DB2 Universal Database, IBM Cloudscape, and Apache Derby databases.
r.n: * 2021-03-10: 2.1.3 - Report failures in SQLGetDiagRec. This should warn on many silent errors. - Workaround issue with using SQLGetSubString with a large buffer on a DBCLOB with locator by trimming from first instead of last null byte. - Workaround bug in SQL/CLI caused by unknown PTF, which causes a buffer overflow with SQLGetData on char-like values. The PTF causing the regression is unidentified, but workaround PTFs seem to exist, including SI75759. The workaround will likely be kept until most no longer have the defective PTF.
